# Copilot Instructions
- Follow the style of existing code for consistency
- Follow SOLID principles unless existing code suggests otherwise
- If existing code does not follow SOLID principles orbest practices, indicate this in your final response.
- Respect clean architecture boundaries
- Ask for clarification if intent is unclear
- If tests are altered, indicate this with "TESTS MODIFIED" in your final response.
- If the prompt is just "help" list the prompt files .github/prompts directory and agent files in .github/agents directory.
